22 #include "mutation++.h"
23 #include <catch.hpp>
24 #include <Eigen/Dense>

26 using namespace Mutation;
27 using namespace Mutation::Utilities;
28 using namespace Mutation::Utilities::IO;

31 
32 typedef Matrix<double,7,1> Dimension;
33 
34 void checkUnits(const Units& units, Dimension dimension, double factor = 1.0)
35 {
36  INFO("factor = " << factor);
37  INFO("dimension = " << dimension.transpose());
38  INFO("exponents = " << units.exponents().transpose());
39  CHECK(units.factor() == Approx(factor));
40  CHECK(units.exponents().isApprox(dimension));
41 }
42 
43 void checkUnits(
44  const char* const symbol, Dimension dimension, double factor = 1.0)
45 {
46  INFO("symbol = " << symbol);
47  INFO("factor = " << factor);
48  INFO("dimension = " << dimension.transpose());
49  Units units;
50  CHECK_NOTHROW(units = Units(symbol));
51  checkUnits(units, dimension, factor);
52 }
53 
57 TEST_CASE("Units", "[utilities]")
58 {
59  // Define the expected dimensions for different types of units
60  Dimension length = MatrixXd::Identity(7,7).col(0);
61  Dimension mass = MatrixXd::Identity(7,7).col(1);
62  Dimension time = MatrixXd::Identity(7,7).col(2);
63  Dimension current = MatrixXd::Identity(7,7).col(3);
64  Dimension temperature = MatrixXd::Identity(7,7).col(4);
65  Dimension quantity = MatrixXd::Identity(7,7).col(5);
66  Dimension intensity = MatrixXd::Identity(7,7).col(6);
67  Dimension force = length + mass - 2*time;
68  Dimension energy = force + length;
69  Dimension power = energy - time;
70  Dimension area = 2*length;
71  Dimension volume = 3*length;
72  Dimension density = mass - volume;
73  Dimension pressure = force - area;
74 
75  // Check them dimensions and factors of predefined units
76  checkUnits("Å" , length, 1.0e-10);
77  checkUnits("mm" , length, 0.001);
78  checkUnits("cm" , length, 0.01);
79  checkUnits("m" , length);
80  checkUnits("km" , length, 1000.0);
81  checkUnits("g" , mass, 0.001);
82  checkUnits("kg" , mass);
83  checkUnits("s" , time);
84  checkUnits("min" , time, 60.0);
85  checkUnits("A" , current);
86  checkUnits("K" , temperature);
87  checkUnits("molecule", quantity, 6.0221415e-23);
88  checkUnits("mol" , quantity);
89  checkUnits("kmol" , quantity, 1000.0);
90  checkUnits("cd" , intensity);
91  checkUnits("N" , force);
92  checkUnits("meV" , energy, 6.242e-21);
93  checkUnits("eV" , energy, 6.242e-18);
94  checkUnits("J" , energy);
95  checkUnits("cal" , energy, 4.184);
96  checkUnits("kJ" , energy, 1000.0);
97  checkUnits("kcal" , energy, 4184.0);
98  checkUnits("Pa" , pressure);
99  checkUnits("bar" , pressure, 100000.0);
100  checkUnits("atm" , pressure, 101325.0);
101 
102  // Check some combinations of units
103  checkUnits("kg m/s s" , force);
104  checkUnits("cal / s" , power, 4.184);
105  checkUnits("g/cm-cm-cm", density, 1000.0);
106  checkUnits("km-Å" , area, 1.0e-7);
107  checkUnits("cm.K" , length + temperature, 0.01);
108  checkUnits(Units("cm")^3, volume, 1.0e-6);
109  checkUnits(Units("kg")*Units("m")/(Units("s")^2)*100.0, force, 100.0);
110 
111  // Check that invalid input fails correctly
112  CHECK_THROWS_AS(Units(" " ) , InvalidInputError);
113  CHECK_THROWS_AS(Units("/" ) , InvalidInputError);
114  CHECK_THROWS_AS(Units(" /m-m") , InvalidInputError);
115  CHECK_THROWS_AS(Units("m-m/ ") , InvalidInputError);
116  CHECK_THROWS_AS(Units("m/kg/s") , InvalidInputError);
117  CHECK_THROWS_AS(Units("text") , InvalidInputError);
118  CHECK_THROWS_AS(Units("m^2" ) , InvalidInputError);
119 
120  // Check conversions
121  CHECK(Units("cal").convertTo(1.0, "kJ") == Approx(4.184 / 1000.0));
122  CHECK(Units("Å.cm/s").convertTo(1.0, "m.m/s") == Approx(1.0e-12));
123  CHECK(Units("g/cm.cm.cm").convertToBase(1.0) == Approx(1000.0));
124 
125  // String conversion
126  CHECK(Units("kg-m/s-s").toString() == "m kg / s^2");
127  CHECK(Units("N-m").toString() == "m^2 kg / s^2");
128 }
129 
133 TEST_CASE("Utility functions", "[utilities]")
134 {
135  SECTION("ordinalSuffix()") {
136  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 0) == "th");
137  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 1) == "st");
138  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 2) == "nd");
139  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 3) == "rd");
140  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 4) == "th");
141  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 5) == "th");
142  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 6) == "th");
143  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 7) == "th");
144  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 8) == "th");
145  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 9) == "th");
146  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 10) == "th");
147  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 11) == "th");
148  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 12) == "th");
149  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 13) == "th");
150  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 14) == "th");
151  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 15) == "th");
152  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 16) == "th");
153  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 17) == "th");
154  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 18) == "th");
155  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 19) == "th");
156  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 20) == "th");
157  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 21) == "st");
158  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 22) == "nd");
159  CHECK(ordinalSuffix( 23) == "rd");
160  CHECK(ordinalSuffix(501) == "st");
161  CHECK(ordinalSuffix(502) == "nd");
162  CHECK(ordinalSuffix(503) == "rd");
163  CHECK(ordinalSuffix(504) == "th");
164  CHECK(ordinalSuffix(511) == "th");
165  CHECK(ordinalSuffix(512) == "th");
166  CHECK(ordinalSuffix(513) == "th");
167  CHECK(ordinalSuffix(521) == "st");
168  CHECK(ordinalSuffix(522) == "nd");
169  CHECK(ordinalSuffix(523) == "rd");
170  }
171 }

173 
177 TEST_CASE("XML classes", "[utilities]")
178 {
179  TemporaryFile file;
180  file << "<tag att=\"100\">\n"
181  << " <!-- comment -->\n"
182  << " <child1> text </child1>\n"
183  << " <child2> <child3 att=\"value\"/> </child2>\n"
184  << "</tag>";
185  file.close();
186 
187  XmlDocument doc(file.filename());
188  CHECK(doc.file() == file.filename());
189 
190  XmlElement& root = doc.root();
191  CHECK(root.tag() == "tag");
192  CHECK(root.text().empty());
193  CHECK(root.line() == 1);
194  CHECK(root.document() == &doc);
195 
196  std::string att_str; int att_int;
197  CHECK(root.hasAttribute("att"));
198  CHECK(root.getAttribute("att", att_str) == "100");
199  CHECK(root.getAttribute("att", att_int) == 100);
200  CHECK_FALSE(root.hasAttribute("bla"));
201 
202  XmlElement::const_iterator it = root.begin();
203  CHECK(it->tag() == "child1");
204  CHECK(it->text() == " text ");
205  CHECK(it->line() == 3);
206  CHECK(it->begin() == it->end());
207 
208  it++;
209  CHECK(it->tag() == "child2");
210  CHECK(it->text().empty());
211  CHECK(it->line() == 4);
212  CHECK(it+1 == root.end());
213 
214  it = it->begin();
215  CHECK(it->tag() == "child3");
216  CHECK(it->text().empty());
217  CHECK(it->line() == 4);
218  CHECK(it->getAttribute("att", att_str) == "value");
219 
220  // Parsing errors
221  CHECK_THROWS_AS(XmlElement("a <tag/>"), Error);
222  CHECK_THROWS_AS(XmlElement("<tag"), Error);
223  CHECK_THROWS_AS(XmlElement("<tag>"), Error);
224  CHECK_THROWS_AS(XmlElement("<tag att=\" />"), Error);
225  CHECK_THROWS_AS(XmlElement("<tag att=\"\" >"), Error);
226  CHECK_THROWS_AS(XmlElement("<tag> text <tag>"), Error);
227  CHECK_THROWS_AS(XmlElement("<tag> text </ta>"), Error);
228  CHECK_THROWS_AS(XmlElement("<tag> text </tag"), Error);
229  CHECK_THROWS_AS(XmlElement("<tag> <child> </tag>"), Error);
230 
231 }
